description: Established in 2010, Blibli.com, a Djarum Group venture, is Indonesia's leading omnichannel e-commerce platform, seamlessly integrating lifestyle and commerce for its users.

roles.roleDescription: Led the seller platform's strategic roadmao, enchancing seller experiences, retention and growth.
keyAchievement: Executed pivotal projects including seller fraud management, homepage revamp, promotions and seller learning center
